name: Restrict Content Pro – Terms and Conditions
author: Andy Brudktuhl

sections.description: Adds a Terms and Conditions checkbox to the Restrict Content Pro registration form. You can even have the label open the terms in a new link if they are not included above or below your form in the content of the page.
sections.installation:
Install and Activate from wordpress.org plugin repository.

It will work with default settings up activation. Check \’Terms\’ menu under \’Restrict\’ menu section to update default values.
sections.changelog:
1.2 – Switched to fields wrapper https://github.com/abrudtkuhl/restrict-content-pro-require-terms/pull/2
1.1 – Menu Priority fixes https://wordpress.org/support/topic/admin-page-not-found-10?replies=2#post-7604291
1.0 – Plugin core functionality
